sentences.en: By noon, all 61 people were judged out of danger.
sentences.cn: 到中午时, 61个人看来都脱离危险了.

sentences.en: Guests are requested to vacate their rooms by noon on the day of departure.
sentences.cn: 房客务请在离开之日的中午以前腾出房间。

sentences.en: Hotel guests are requested to vacate their rooms by twelve noon.
sentences.cn: 旅馆的房客按规定要在中午十二点之前退房.

sentences.en: I'll call you guys tomorrow. Noon-ish.
sentences.cn: 我明天给你们打电话，中午前后吧。

sentences.en: She promised to call at noon.
Shops usually shut from noon-3pm, and stay open late.
sentences.cn: 商店通常中午到下午3点关门，然后营业到很晚。

sentences.en: The company will serve a meal at noon to all staff workers.
sentences.cn: 该公司将为所有职员提供午餐.

sentences.en: The goods will be delivered at noon tomorrow.
The meeting is scheduled to commence at noon.
The Prime Minister is scheduled to arrive at noon.
The rocket is due to lift off at noon on Friday.
sentences.cn: 火箭定于星期五中午发射.

sentences.en: They attended morning , noon and night on the dying man.
sentences.cn: 他们日夜照顾那个生命垂危的人.

sentences.en: We reached the summit at noon.
sentences.cn: 中午时分我们抵达峰顶。

sentences.en: We should be there by noon.
sentences.cn: 我们应该最晚中午到达。

sentences.en: We'll reserve the ticket for you till tomorrow noon.
sentences.cn: 票为您保留到明天中午.

phrases.tran_cn: 正午；全盛时期；顶峰；[口]危机

trans.tran_cn: 正午，中午，全盛期，顶点，〈古〉午夜，晌午
